heroSection.intro: Specializing in MERN Stack. I leverage cutting-edge technologies to bring web projects to life.

aboutSection.aboutdesc: An indie Full-Stack developer with over 3 years of experience.
aboutSection.aboutp1: Hello, I'm Fauzan Salam Mutaqin, I'm a student from SMAN 81 Jakarta who has a strong talent interest in the field of bug hunting and programming.
aboutSection.aboutp2: My expertise is mainly in the field of coding, Mongodb, MySQL.
aboutSection.aboutp3: I enjoy continuously learning new technologies and staying updated with industry trends. I thrive in team environments, believing collaboration fosters innovation, yet I also possess the ability to work effectively independently.
aboutSection.aboutp4: With a passion for ongoing growth and contributing to the tech industry, I'm ready to tackle new challenges in software development.

projectdesc.1: Credit simulation uses the PHP programming language, to calculate the annuity amount, flat and effective, 90% accurate.
projectdesc.2: The hacker class is a platform created by the PIDAS81 CDMS department, which aims to train CDMS members about IT.
projectdesc.3: CDMS e-learning was created with the aim of making it easier for members to complete assignments and submit assignments.
projectdesc.4: reconstruction of the PIDAS81 website, to be cooler but still in the development stage.
